S.FORM: hi tyaba inkyasan mu , khmey ci baley yunux mu , cmyax ci ro'iy mu uy, bawi ci nguhuw mu, tipik ci ngowa mu, ana ga mlabuw ci g'nux mu hiya. lokah 'ba mu. khmey ci skutow mu uy, tpik ci puga mu. mtumow biyux mu uy. ruyux ci kakay mu. lalau yaca, kba' cu ci skotung ro mtenah baley Bnrwan qa galan cpung (Yawi Nomin) (1 6) (Llyung klesan ) ( : .2001)
